summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 17, Hill Tract Addition Supplemental Plat, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and 16th Avenue South, between Jackson Street and Main Street; by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8896 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
